tasks.title: Initialize project with Vite + React + TypeScript
tasks.description: Create new Vite project with React and TypeScript template. Set up package.json, tsconfig.json, and vite.config.ts. Install base dependencies.

tasks.title: Set up Tailwind CSS
tasks.description: Install and configure Tailwind CSS with PostCSS. Create tailwind.config.js and postcss.config.js. Set up base styles in index.css.

tasks.title: Create TypeScript types
tasks.description: Define Habit interface and AppState types in src/types/index.ts. Include all necessary type definitions for the app.

tasks.title: Implement date utilities
tasks.description: Create src/utils/dates.ts with functions: formatDate, getWeekDays, isToday, isSameDay, getDateString. All functions should work with ISO date strings.

tasks.title: Implement streak calculation utilities
tasks.description: Create src/utils/streaks.ts with functions: calculateStreak (current consecutive days), calculateLongestStreak. Handle edge cases for new habits and gaps.

tasks.title: Implement localStorage utilities
tasks.description: Create src/utils/storage.ts with functions: saveHabits, loadHabits, clearHabits. Handle JSON serialization and error cases.

tasks.title: Create HabitContext with reducer
tasks.description: Create src/context/HabitContext.tsx with React Context and useReducer. Implement all actions: ADD_HABIT, UPDATE_HABIT, DELETE_HABIT, TOGGLE_COMPLETION, LOAD_HABITS. Include localStorage sync.

tasks.title: Create useHabits hook
tasks.description: Create src/hooks/useHabits.ts that wraps HabitContext. Provide convenient methods: addHabit, updateHabit, deleteHabit, toggleCompletion, getHabitById.

tasks.title: Create Header component
tasks.description: Create src/components/Header.tsx with app title and current date display. Style with Tailwind CSS.

tasks.title: Create StreakBadge component
tasks.description: Create src/components/StreakBadge.tsx showing streak count with flame icon. Different styling for active vs broken streaks.

tasks.title: Create WeeklyHeatmap component
tasks.description: Create src/components/WeeklyHeatmap.tsx showing 7-day grid (Mon-Sun). Color cells based on completion status. Show day labels.

tasks.title: Create HabitCard component
tasks.description: Create src/components/HabitCard.tsx displaying habit name, description, StreakBadge, WeeklyHeatmap, and completion toggle button. Include edit and delete buttons.

tasks.title: Create HabitForm component
tasks.description: Create src/components/HabitForm.tsx as a modal for adding/editing habits. Include name (required) and description fields. Support create and edit modes.

tasks.title: Create HabitList component
tasks.description: Create src/components/HabitList.tsx that renders all habits using HabitCard. Include empty state message when no habits exist.

tasks.title: Wire up App.tsx
tasks.description: Update src/App.tsx to compose all components: Header, HabitList, HabitForm. Wrap with HabitProvider. Add 'Add Habit' button to trigger form.

tasks.title: Add delete confirmation
tasks.description: Add confirmation dialog when deleting a habit. Prevent accidental deletion of habits with history.

tasks.title: Final polish and testing
tasks.description: Test all user flows manually. Fix any styling issues. Ensure responsive design works on mobile. Verify localStorage persistence.
